projects.title: IDA Government Digital Services (GDS) – Multiple Projects
projects.numOfPeople: 18 to start, expecting 50 by Dec 2016; 200 by 2019
projects.openRoles: PM, BA, QA, Dev, DevOps, Security, UX, Data Specialists
projects.description: The award of this Request for Proposal (RFP) is delayed but should be awarded anytime now. This is a 3 years contract with an option to extend for another 3 years. GDS is a new government units set up with a start-up and agile culture from the start. The scope of work will include co-sourcing on Smart Nation projects like the Moment of Life, PaaS, Emerging Technologies etc. It will also include MOM’s WINS Phase 2 project. Singapore is looking into building a Smart Nation Platform.

projects.title: SIAM (Thailand)
projects.openRoles: TBC. Possible openings for Developer(s) with #madjavaskillz, DevOps Champion, Business Analyst, Quality Analyst
projects.description: The MVP for Registration for PromptPay – the Thai-government-mandated inter-bank fast transfer service – is live! But the enhancement requests have only just begun... so many, in fact, that our backlog is having to be relocated just to fit all the cards on the wall. This poses a problem, not least because we only have one week of the current engagement left, and Salah is on his own again from Monday... it's not unreasonable to suspect that we might not get everything done! That said, we are hearing rumblings of an extension, which John is investigating. Watch this space for that and also news of future opportunities.
